CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 5, 1941, pg. 22, reads: "New Pool At Ammon Center Attracts Swimmers - The new swimming pool at Ammon is one of the finest in city and swimmers in this area are taking advantage of it. Pictured here are some of the people who ducked the heat wave last week by swimming at Ammon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children, men, and women, including Miriam Sharpe Fountain seated second from right, on side of Ammon pool
